conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model successfully translates the 2D floor plan into a clean isometric cutaway with clear verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection and wall geometry. Wall thickness is consistent and corners are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High room fidelity; kitchen island and stair placement are accurate. Minor variance in window count on the bottom wall (extra windows added compared to 2D plan).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture matches perfectly (bed, kitchen sink/stove, bathroom fixtures). Scaled appropriately.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render with logical lighting. No text labels or UI clutter. Slight deduction for minor geometry softening on curved wall elements.

detected_errors.description: Additional windows added to the front-facing exterior wall that were not present in the original 2D floor plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that preserves the original layout, room adjacencies, and furniture placement with professional execution.
